mapper.select: SELECT n.id,n.keywords,n.author,n.title,n.source,n.abstract,n.create_time,n.publish_time,n.update_time, nt.type_id ,nt.type_name,u.user_id,u.username FROM news n LEFT JOIN news_type nt ON n.news_type=nt.type_id LEFT JOIN users u ON n.user_id=u.user_id
